title: U.S. banks struggle to meet Mifid regulations
description: Regulation is a word that often leaves businesses unsettled, and U.S. banks are currently learning this lesson in real-time. They are grappling with a regulatory dilemma that brings them face to face with the European Union’s sweeping financial regulation overhaulâ€”Mifid II.
